Question: When his armies deserted him and joined with Octavian, he cried out that this person had betrayed him.
Hints: Suetonius, writing about the same time as Plutarch, also says this person died from an asp bite.
It seems that in reality Antony wanted this person’s promise to support his intended war against the Parthians.
This person was regarded as a great beauty, even in the ancient world.
